problem_names:
lemma standard_control_dependence_def:"n controls\<^sub>s n' =
    (\<exists>a a' as. (n' \<notin> set(sourcenodes (a#as))) \<and> (n -a#as\<rightarrow>* n') \<and>
                   (n' postdominates (targetnode a)) \<and>
                   (valid_edge a') \<and> (sourcenode a' = n) \<and> 
                   (\<not> n' postdominates (targetnode a')))"

lemma standard_control_dependence_def_variant:
  "n controls\<^sub>s n' = (\<exists>as. (n -as\<rightarrow>* n') \<and> (n \<noteq> n') \<and>
    (\<not> n' postdominates n) \<and> (n' \<notin> set(sourcenodes as)) \<and>
  (\<forall>n'' \<in> set(targetnodes as). n' postdominates n''))"

lemma inner_node_standard_control_dependence_predecessor:
  assumes "inner_node n" "(_Entry_) -as\<rightarrow>* n" "n -as'\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)"
  obtains n' where "n' controls\<^sub>s n"
translations:
lemma standard_control_dependence_def:"n controls\<^sub>s n' =
    (\<exists>a a' as. (n' \<notin> set(sourcenodes (a#as))) \<and> (n -a#as\<rightarrow>* n') \<and>
                   (n' postdominates (targetnode a)) \<and>
                   (valid_edge a') \<and> (sourcenode a' = n) \<and> 
                   (\<not> n' postdominates (targetnode a')))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. n controls\<^sub>s n' =
    (\<exists>a a' as.
        n' \<notin> set (sourcenodes (a # as)) \<and>
        n -a # as\<rightarrow>* n' \<and>
        n' postdominates targetnode a \<and>
        valid_edge a' \<and>
        sourcenode a' = n \<and> \<not> n' postdominates targetnode a')

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. n controls\<^sub>s (_Exit_) \<Longrightarrow> False

lemma standard_control_dependence_def_variant:
  "n controls\<^sub>s n' = (\<exists>as. (n -as\<rightarrow>* n') \<and> (n \<noteq> n') \<and>
    (\<not> n' postdominates n) \<and> (n' \<notin> set(sourcenodes as)) \<and>
  (\<forall>n'' \<in> set(targetnodes as). n' postdominates n''))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. n controls\<^sub>s n' =
    (\<exists>as.
        n -as\<rightarrow>* n' \<and>
        n \<noteq> n' \<and>
        \<not> n' postdominates n \<and>
        n' \<notin> set (sourcenodes as) \<and>
        (\<forall>n''\<in>set (targetnodes as). n' postdominates n''))

lemma inner_node_standard_control_dependence_predecessor:
  assumes "inner_node n" "(_Entry_) -as\<rightarrow>* n" "n -as'\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)"
  obtains n' where "n' controls\<^sub>s n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>n'.
        n' controls\<^sub>s n \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  inner_node n
  (_Entry_) -as\<rightarrow>* n
  n -as'\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>n'.
        n' controls\<^sub>s n \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
